Corporate (Volume License) version of Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2010. Office 2010 is the latest version of the popular office suite from Microsoft. Ribbon interface, familiar to us from Office 2007 again present, but has undergone some changes and improvements, so that combined with the new interface of Windows 7, and gives users more freedom to arrange and supplement tabs on your own. Innovations in Office 2010 are many, the most notable are: The ability to organize and Ribbon-; fully redesigned Outlook, which keeps so. social networks, sorting, archiving, and ignoring emails quickly cleaning, also has a new interface; PowerPoint has many new features, such as inclusion of several video files into a single slide presentations directly to the network, new animations and effects many others. Another essential improvement is the ability to edit a single file simultaneously from several people and facilitated retention of office documents in your own Microsoft Live account. 

Installation: 

Mount the iso file in virtual drive or burn to DVD and install. You can use the original Volume License Key, MAC or keys to enable this office suite. 

Improvements in SP1:

Microsoft Office 2010 Service Pack 1 (SP1) provides the latest updates to Office 2010. This service pack contains two main categories of adjustments: 

1.Korektsii not issued before, made specifically for this package. In addition to general adjustments in products such changes include stability improvements in productivity, as well as protection. 

2.Vsichki public updates issued in June 2011, and pooled all updates issued in April 2011. 

Access 2010 SP1 

Access 2010 SP1 adds new feature to integrate content from the community gallery "Parts of the applications." Corrected a problem that arises when trying to export a file to the Access workbook Excel. Improved productivity in publishing client forms from Access, which contain embedded images. 

OneNote 2010 SP1 

Added new option from the Open Web, which is located under File - Open. This allows you to open OneNote notebooks from Windows Live SkyDrive. 

Corrects a problem that has arisen in the implementation of a bullet or numbered list to a blank line or lines. Corrects issue where notebooks are visible in the navigation bar when you open or create multiple notebooks, which are then minimized. Corrects issue where the wrong style is used to set the next line after the link. Corrects issue where marked as read pages in OneNote 2010 change marked as unread. OneNote 2010 SP1 now highlight elements of the search results. Corrects issue where a script can be moved properly when sharing belezhnik.Korigira issue where you receive an error "Exception 0x80042001 (invalid XML)", when using the OneNote Object Model Export and Import subsequent page in which content is Swedish. Corrects issue where a printout is shown as a red X when copying or moving format OneNote 2007 page printout containing the format in OneNote 2010. Corrects the problem of copyright page when using the OneNote Object Model export and subsequent import of the page. OneNote 2010 SP1 has become smooth when the mouse pointer is located near the edges of the screen. Corrects a problem regarding the method of UpdateHierarchy object models. 

Outlook 2010 SP1 

Outlook 2010 SP1 can be configured to always use your account to send a default. Corrects the problem of delay time between meetings. 

PowerPoint 2010 SP1 

Corrects issue where the mouse pointer disappears when you select the option from the list a second monitor of show. PowerPoint Viewer is now included with the "Package for CD". Corrects a problem in which occurs the following error message when editing an object or activation of Excel, which contains the code of Visual Basic for Applications (VBA). Corrects issue where an incorrect return value Runs.Count, when the presentation in PowerPoint 2003 format performs command object model of PowerPoint 2010. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t use KMS Activation firstly you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know if its installing Trojans or other viruses onto your system and secondly it only activates it for 180 days. Activate it permanently with a serial and by ringing Microsoft and getting the conformation ID, that way you know you are safe and secure and also you know it is permanently activated.

01. start Word.
02. If the activation window appears close it.
03. Go to menu File, Help, Change Product Code, and then enter key:
828CH-G4FPY-HMH4R-32GCK-6D9BH or 3W3MQ-H7M6X-3WYP7-TPCH6-8G8T2
04. Untick the "Activate over internet" box at the bottom, and click "Next".
05. In the window that appears click "Install".
06. When finished the Install process, close word an then reopen Word.
07. An activation window will appear (if not, go to menu File, Help, Activate).
08. Select the "Phone Activation" option, and click "Next".
09. Pick your country, then ring the number and follow the instructions.
10. When asked for your ID, input the code given in the Word activation window. it will say "this product code is invalid" and you will need to talk to the operator and give them your installation code that Microsoft gives you and they will give you an activation code in return
11. When asked which edition, choose business/volume use, used only on 1 pc.
12. A code will be given back, and enter the code into the activation box.
13. Click "Next", and Office will say that it's permanently activated.
14. Close Word (and any other Office 2010 application).
15. Restart Word, and go to Help to check the subscription status.

Office 2010 is now fully and permanently activated.

it is a business/volume license (you can install on multiple computers) and when you call microsoft you should have heard an automated voice saying something like "we do not collect any personal Identifiable information about you" so you are safe if you are worried about that.
